author: felicity
msg: bug 1652: the suggested patch doesn't work.  perl 5.6.0 and perl 5.6.1
both have EU:MM 5.45, but the one in 5.6.1 has PM_FILTER.  so reverting
the initial patch since it doesn't take this into account.
